hero.title: Preserving Somali
hero.subtitle: Knowledge & Culture
hero.description: We are dedicated to preserving and sharing the rich cultural heritage and knowledge of Somalia through our comprehensive digital library platform. Our mission is to make Somali literature, research, and educational resources accessible to everyone, everywhere.

stats.title: Our Impact in Numbers
stats.description: Discover the scale of our digital preservation efforts and community impact

mission.title: Preserving Somali Heritage for Future Generations
mission.description: Our mission is to create the world's most comprehensive digital library of Somali literature, research, and cultural materials. We believe that knowledge preservation is essential for cultural continuity and educational advancement.
goals: Digitize and preserve rare Somali manuscripts and publications
Provide free access to educational resources for students and researchers
Foster collaboration between Somali scholars and institutions worldwide
Create a sustainable platform for cultural preservation and knowledge sharing

vision.title: Our Vision for the Future
vision.description: We envision a world where Somali knowledge and culture are preserved, accessible, and celebrated globally. Our platform serves as a bridge between the past and future, ensuring that valuable cultural heritage is never lost.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.description: These fundamental principles guide everything we do in our mission to preserve and share Somali knowledge

preservation.title: Cultural Preservation
preservation.description: We are committed to preserving the rich cultural heritage and knowledge of Somalia for future generations.

community.title: Community First
community.description: We believe in building strong communities around knowledge sharing and cultural exchange.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously innovate to provide the best digital library experience and preservation methods.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: We ensure that knowledge is accessible to everyone, regardless of location or background.

features.title: What Makes Us Special
features.description: Discover the unique features that set our digital library apart and make it the premier destination for Somali knowledge

digitalLibrary.title: Comprehensive Digital Library
digitalLibrary.description: Access thousands of books, journals, research papers, and cultural materials in one centralized platform.

educational.title: Educational Excellence
educational.description: Supporting students, researchers, and educators with high-quality academic resources and materials.

global.title: Global Reach
global.description: Connecting Somali communities worldwide and fostering international collaboration and knowledge exchange.

cta.title: Join Us in Preserving Somali Heritage
cta.description: Be part of our mission to preserve and share Somali knowledge and culture. Whether you're a student, researcher, or cultural enthusiast, there's a place for you in our community.

categories.title: Featured Categories
categories.description: Browse through various knowledge categories and explore the digital library.
